page.title: 20PEEL HALL PARK
page.content: The New Town has developed a series of park land areas around the town and in the centre of our block is one of the most recent_ Peel Hall Park. The parks are in the care of the Park Ranger Services, with teams of rangers organising activities in the park and working very closely with schools and groups in encouraging local people to get the most out of these areas. Peel Hall Park offers ponds (with pond dipping very popular), woodland areas, paddocks for horses,bridleways, a stone circle and a very impressive turf maze. The well trained rangers in their distinctive green uniforms are very popular visitors to the schools. During out of school time they organise competitions,7 a side football tournaments and barbecues. Pages 1 to 9 by St.Stephens School Pages 10 to 20 by Brook Acre School
